connect_timeout.description:
Maximum number of seconds available to single connection
attempt

connect_delay.description:
Delay (in seconds) between two consecutive connection
establishment attempts

request_timeout.description:
Maximum duration (in seconds) of read or write
request/response exchange.

request_delay.description:
Delay (in seconds) between two consecutive requests
(minimal duration between response and next request)

request_retry_immediate_count.description:
Number of immediate request retries before remote
data is considered unavailable. Total number
of retries is request_retry_immediate_count *
request_retry_delayed_count.

request_retry_delayed_count.description:
Number of delayed request retries before remote data
is considered unavailable. Total number
of retries is request_retry_immediate_count *
request_retry_delayed_count.

request_retry_delay.description:
Delay (in seconds) between two consecutive delayed
request retries

timeout_poll_delay.description:
Delay (in seconds) after read timeout and
before device polling is resumed

interval.description:
Polling interval in seconds or
null if polling is disabled

bit_count.description:
Number of bits used for
encoding/decoding value (not
including offset bits)

device.description: structure of device configuration depends on device type

module.description: full python module name that implements device

connect_delay.description:
Delay (in seconds) between two consecutive connection
establishment attempts

request_timeout.description:
Maximum duration (in seconds) of request/response
exchange

request_retry_count.description:
Number of request retries before remote data is
considered unavailable

request_retry_delay.description:
Delay (in seconds) between two consecutive request
retries

polling_delay.description:
Delay (in seconds) between two consecutive polling
cycles

items.description:
OID read during polling cycle formated as integers
separated by '.'

OID associated to string hex value formated as
integers separated by '.'

local_host.description: Local listening hostname or IP address

items.description:
data OID formated as integers separated
by '.'

OID associated to string hex value
formated as integers separated by '.'

oneOf.description: In case of INTERROGATE or CHANGE cause

remote_hosts.description: if null, all remote hosts are allowed
